Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi,

I'm using Heritrix 2.0.2 with a few custom processor classes which I use to
extract relevant data from the HTML (by replacing ARCWriterProcessor with
one of the custom classes).
These classes are site-specific, and I have to change them from time to
time.

What is the recommended way to force a reload of some of those classes (of
course, after stopping their running jobs), without stopping all other
running jobs and/or the JVM?

Thank you
Regards
Enrico

--000e0cd253f29eb44d046d9f8fdb
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
